folder: Richmond Road & Summit Avenue, Staten Island, NY
text:
(1)
69 Richmond Road, at the N.E. corner of Summit Ave., showing the Fountain House, after extensive alterations. It was built in 1670. Here Margaret Moncrieffe met Captain Coghlan; here, Also,
Lieutenant Sidney A. Simons, U.S.N.,was born.
62087e
By Eugene G. Putnam.
Courtesy Staten Island Museum
through P. L. Sperr.
(2)
Another view of the house from the opposite direction on
Richmond Road.
1924.
P. L. Sperr.
